keyword: calories in 8 ounces of chicken breast
title: Calories in 8 Ounces of Chicken Breast
meta_description: Discover calories in 8 ounces of chicken breast, including protein, fat, carbs, per-100g breakdown, and preparation tweaks for accurate tracking.
h1: Calories in 8 Ounces of Chicken Breast
assumptions: Skinless, boneless chicken breast, cooked (roasted or grilled), no sauce/oil added; 8 oz ≈ 227 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, cut, cooking method, seasoning, water content, and measurement; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 8 ounces cooked, skinless chicken breast has ~375 kcal and ~70 g protein.

label_note: Totals are scaled from the per-100 g basis and mirror Nutrition Facts fields.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp olive oil per 100 g
Breaded and fried (vs. grilled) per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in 8 ounces of cooked chicken breast?
faqs.a: About 375 kcal for skinless, boneless, cooked without added fats.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 8 ounces chicken breast?
Are these values for raw or cooked chicken breast?
faqs.a: Cooked weight; raw 8 oz cooks down to about 6 oz, increasing density.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in chicken breast?
faqs.a: Grilling or baking keeps it low; frying or skin-on adds 30–100+ kcal per 100 g.

faqs.q: What are the macros per 100 g of chicken breast?
faqs.a: 165 kcal, 31 g protein, 3.6 g fat, 0 g carbs per 100 g cooked skinless.
